Package game.grounds.environments

Class EnemySpawnableGround

java.lang.Object
edu.monash.fit2099.engine.GameEntity
edu.monash.fit2099.engine.positions.Ground
game.grounds.environments.EnemySpawnableGround
All Implemented Interfaces:
Printable, ResetNotifiable, Resettable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Bush, Graveyard, Hut
public abstract class EnemySpawnableGround
extends Ground
implements ResetNotifiable, Resettable
The EnemySpawnableGround class represents a type of ground in the game world where enemies can spawn over time. It extends the Ground class and provides a mechanism for controlling the spawning of enemies on this type of ground. This class uses a spawner to create and add enemies to the location if the spawn condition is met. It tracks the spawned enemy actors for later operations such as resetting.
See Also:
Ground, ResetNotifiable, Resettable
